vitamin.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health
vitamin.translation[0].definitions[0].no: vitamin A/B/C etc (=a particular type of vitamin)
vitamin.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Try to eat foods that are rich in vitamins and minerals.
Lack of vitamin E can cause skin diseases and tiredness.
vitamin.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Perhaps I ought to take vitamins.
